Please login to UICcareers.com to schedule your career advising appointment.  We prepare students to find careers and excel in them. The Business Career Center offers all UIC Business students:   One-on-one career advising  Resume and cover letter reviews  Biannual Resume Expo where you get feedback from recruiters  Internship coordination  On-campus interviews  Biannual career fairs  Career coaching and workshops        Career Center Highlights     Advisers    Personal career advisers who help you:   Identify your career path  Apply for internships and jobs  Polish your resume  Obtain a LinkedIn headshot  Prepare for interviews  Set up weekly on-campus interviews  MeetÂ with recruiters  Receive career alerts  Find job postings in UICcareers portal  Prepare for twice yearly resume expos and career fairs       Competencies     During your career search and preparation, we also work to instill the top competencies employers seek in new hires.   Verbal Communication  Working effectively in a team  Initiative  Problem solving and decision making  Building and maintaining relationships        Paid Internships   Long gone are the days of unpaid internships. Our business students are valued interns and the majority find internships that pay between $8 and $27 per hour.
